name: TempUpkeepRegistrationRequests
description: Contract to accept requests for upkeep registrations.

eventDecorators.name: MinLINKChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: RegistrationApproved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The new subToken implementation*.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

eventDecorators.name: RegistrationRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

functionDecorators.name: approved
functionDecorators.description: this function is called after registering upkeep on the Registry contract.

parameterDecorators.name: hash
parameterDecorators.description: hash of the message data of the registration request that is being approved.

parameterDecorators.name: displayName
parameterDecorators.description: display name for the upkeep being approved.

parameterDecorators.name: upkeepId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the upkeep that has been registered.

functionDecorators.name: getMinLINKWei
functionDecorators.description: read the minimum LINK required to send registration request.

functionDecorators.name: onTokenTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Called when LINK is sent to the contract via `transferAndCall`.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of LINK sent (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Payload of the transaction.

functionDecorators.name: register
functionDecorators.description: register can only be called through transferAndCall on LINK contract.

parameterDecorators.name: name
parameterDecorators.description: name of the upkeep to be registered.

parameterDecorators.name: encryptedEmail
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of LINK sent (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: upkeepContract
parameterDecorators.description: address to peform upkeep on.

parameterDecorators.name: gasLimit
parameterDecorators.description: amount of gas to provide the target contract when performing upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: adminAddress
parameterDecorators.description: address to cancel upkeep and withdraw remaining funds.

parameterDecorators.name: checkData
parameterDecorators.description: data passed to the contract when checking for upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: source
parameterDecorators.description: application sending this request.

functionDecorators.name: setMinLINKWei
functionDecorators.description: owner calls this function to set minimum LINK required to send registration request.

parameterDecorators.name: minimumLINKWei
parameterDecorators.description: minimum LINK required to send registration request.

functionDecorators.name: setRegistrationConfig
functionDecorators.description: owner calls this function to set if registration requests should be sent directly to the Keeper Registry.

parameterDecorators.name: autoApproveRegistrations
parameterDecorators.description: setting for autoapprove registrations.

parameterDecorators.name: registrationsWindowSizeInBlocks
parameterDecorators.description: window size defined in number of blocks.

parameterDecorators.name: registrationsCountPerWindow
parameterDecorators.description: number of registrations that can be auto approved in above window.

parameterDecorators.name: keeperRegistry
parameterDecorators.description: new keeper registry address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.
